problems.title: Generate Binary Strings
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an integer N, generate all binary strings of length N.
The strings should be printed in lexicographical (ascending) order.

Backtracking Approach:
Start with an empty string. At each step, append '0' and recurse, then append '1' and recurse.
Base case: when string length is N, add to results.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2

Sample Output
00 01 10 11

Explanation:
All binary strings of length 2 are 00, 01, 10, 11.
hintsList: Use recursion. At each step, you can append '0' or '1'.
Base case: if current string length == n, add to result list.
